EmailTemplate.subject: INTERNAL USE ONLY: SMOKE DETECTOR CAMPAIGN

Regards,
Philly311
Customer Support
SMOKE DETECTORS SAVE LIVES! Have them? Please test and replace batteries if needed. Need them? Contact 311 to learn about getting a free one installed.
